cgcloud__Account_Relationship__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Relationship__c
cgcloud__Account_Relationship__c.description: This object represents the relationship between two customer accounts.

LastActivityDate.description: Most recent date on which a user performed an activity on this record.

cgcloud__Account__c.description: Specifies the main customer in the relationship.

cgcloud__End_Date__c.description: Date until which the relationship is active.

cgcloud__Is_Primary_Relationship__c.description: Indicates whether the relationship is a primary relationship (true) or not (false).

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the Customer Relationship record.

cgcloud__Related_Account_Name__c.description: Name of the customer who is related to the main customer of the relationship.

cgcloud__Related_Account__c.description: Customer who is related to the main customer in the relationship.

cgcloud__Relationship_Type__c.description: Defines the relationship that's defined by this account-to-account relation record (Payer, Payee, Wholesaler, Delivery Recipient, Bill To, and so on.).

cgcloud__Self_Relationship__c.description: Formula thatâ€™s used to indicate that the relationship is a self relationship.

cgcloud__Start_Date__c.description: Date from which the relationship is active.
